title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 67.11 - Inspection report central repository
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 67.11 - Inspection report central repository

State Regulations

An insurer may utilize a separate entity to maintain a central repository of its private passenger automobile physical damage inspection reports to improve the effectiveness of the insurer's inspection program. More than one insurer may use the services provided by the same central repository. Reporting to a central repository shall be voluntary. Notes

67.11

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 4/1/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
